title: jasonkerten8899
author: jasonkerten8899
content: Hi I topped up amazon account end of 2019 gift cards were bought with cashI got them from various projects and services which I helped to some friendsmy plan was to move to USA but I didnt and so balance sitting without useas I understand I would need USA address and debit card so all would go smoothly which I dont haveI could ask some people for that but I prefer at this time sell all accountprice is very reasonable its  very old account and all should be fine I placed many orders few years agoI understand if you dont want send money before hence we have escrow services in this forumI can provide links to my paxful account so you see I have some online feedback let me know if any questionsafter sale you get transfer to your email you can put your 2fa and we can even sign some agreement that of course I have no claims any more over account
